items.sentence: I know that Tom isn't a very interesting guy.
I know that Tom is afraid of catching a cold.
I know that Tom is about the same age as you.
I know that Tom is a pretty good snowboarder.
I know that Tom is a lot taller than Mary is.
I know that Tom is a little taller than I am.
I know that Tom is a good husband and father.
I know that Tom is a bit taller than Mary is.
I know that Tom is a better driver than I am.
I know that I'm supposed to do that with you.
